xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #phenotips on 06 August 2014
xwikidoc.content: <sdumitriu2> has quit 11:50 <sdumitriu1> has joined #phenotips 15:30 <ijessa> has joined #phenotips 15:32 <meatcar> sdumitriu: Here's one where you can pick the years or months. Change "Min view mode" to enable only selecting months or years. http://eternicode.github.io/bootstrap-datepicker/ 15:36 <sdumitriu> OK, looks interesting 15:37 <sdumitriu> Still, we whould need a way to skip going down 15:37 <sdumitriu> Like there's the Today button, there should be a "I don't have more details" button 15:38 <sdumitriu> So that we don't clutter the user's view with so many buttons 16:04 <ijessa> has quit 22:24 <jim^^> has quit
